short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows graphs and diagrams rendered by PlantUML at your favorite site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can render PlantUML at your favorite site other than original pegmatite. Bug: You need once open this extension option and press save.
